sentences.en: Additional data Streams emerge after Dostya's enlistment into the Cybran Nation military.
sentences.cn: 更多的数据流是关于多斯达尼亚加入赛伯军队后的情况.

sentences.en: At the end of my term of enlistment I decided to return to civilian life.
sentences.cn: 在我退役的时候，我决定复员过平民生活。

sentences.en: Defections are occurring at a rapid rate , and enlistment drives are flagging.
sentences.cn: 倒戈反水的事不断发生, 征收新兵的工作疲疲沓沓.

sentences.en: He again offered himself for enlistment and was again rejected.
sentences.cn: 他再次要求应征入伍,结果再次被回绝了.

sentences.en: One obstacle to the enlistment of able professors was that they had to take holy orders.
sentences.cn: 征聘有才能的教授的障碍是他们必须成为牧师.

sentences.en: Restart service ( required for enlistment to succeed )
sentences.cn: 重新启动服务 ( 成功登记所必须 )

sentences.en: To strengthen or raise ( an armed force ) by enlistment.
sentences.cn: 征募,充实通过增加人员来加强或提高 ( 某个武装力量 )

sentences.en: When his one year enlistment was up he headed for Alabama, tried blacksmithing and failed.
sentences.cn: 当他一年的服役期结束时,他去了亚拉巴马州, 尝试着做铁匠,但是又失败了.

words.tran_cn: 使入伍；征募；谋取…的赞助或帮助

trans.tran_en: Enlistment is the period of time for which someone is a member of one of the armed forces
